text:
I lost 14 Kg in 44 days last year. Has been transformational. I know so many friends struggling to lose weight

Nutrition, Training, planning or just having someone to talk. A fitness buddy available 24*7. 

Building this at @_nightsweekends . What do you think @_buildspace https://t.co/uC0vNaKMjI
